languages.text: {n}Слабо улыбнувшись, Фроше спокойно отвечает:{/n} "За мужество, господин".
{n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."
languages.original_text: {n}Слабо улыбнувшись, Фроше спокойно отвечает:{/n} "За мужество, господин".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

languages.text: {n}弗罗舍微微一笑，平和地回答道。{/n}“为了我的勇气，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗罗舍微微一笑，平和地回答道。{/n}“为了我的勇气，大人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}弱々しい笑顔を作り、フロッシャーは落ち着いたトーンで答えた。{/n}「私の勇気の為にです」
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

traits.locale_text: {n}弱々しい笑顔を作り、フロッシャーは落ち着いたトーンで答えた。{/n}「私の勇気の為にです」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Froscher responde con una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Por mi valor, señor».
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Froscher responde con una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Por mi valor, señor».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Mit einem schwachen Lächeln antwortet Froscher ruhig:{/n} "Wegen meines Muts, Sir."
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem schwachen Lächeln antwortet Froscher ruhig:{/n} "Wegen meines Muts, Sir."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Pour mon courage, mon seigneur, » {n}rétorque calmement Froscher sans se départir de son sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."

traits.locale_text: « Pour mon courage, mon seigneur, » {n}rétorque calmement Froscher sans se départir de son sourire.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Froscher, zayıfça gülümseyip sakin tavrıyla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Cesaretimden ötürü efendim."
languages.original_text: {n}With a weak smile, Froscher replies calmly,{/n} "For my courage, sir."
